name: Unmirrored
description:
A game made for weekly game jam(week 148). The theme was 'mirror'.  A theme as interesting as it opens up a lot of possibilities. One of them struck me and I am gladly presenting this game to you! I hope you all will enjoy it!

Credits:

Art and programming : Vedang Javdekar

Music and SFX: OrangeCloud / Nogal_Leaf

Title Screen: Maithili Awasarikar

Please let me know your feedback in the comments section.
